body:
Forbidden

Here is my drabble for this month’s prompt.

“Jon, you must see reason! Think of the consequences for our family!”

“I don’t care about the consequences Dany, it is part of our heritage and our culture!”

“Think of the political ramifications! We could start a war!”

“If they are foolish enough to start a war over such a simple thing, then let them try.”

“Dear husband, it is forbidden in their culture to wear black to any event that is not a funeral. You must chose a different colored cloak and tunic!”

blog.description: Hello loves🔥 my name is Crystal ❤️/ 20 / Black 😘/ England native / Game of thrones is LIFE ♥ Star wars is LIFE 🖤/jonerys IS my life😍/kit and emilia are goals/positivity and laughter all around/ so if you don't like what I put here oh wells x

summary: I don't think u understand how much this means to me! I remember the first time me and my friend were watching got...two black...
body:
AHHHH! YES! POC Characters FINALLY!!!

I don’t think u understand how much this means to me! I remember the first time me and my friend were watching got…two black British actors wanting to see more people who looked like us represented on a show like this as a main or recurring character.

So I’m just soooooooooo happy we have not one but 3 POC in the main cast (I’m unsure if they are truly mains) but I’m just happy regardless 👏🏾👏🏾

Thank you lord

Thank you Jesus

Yes!

summary: jon is not lord of winterfell and never was, sansa is lady of winterfell bc she's the older stark (and brand doesn't want it)...
question: jon is not lord of winterfell and never was, sansa is lady of winterfell bc she's the older stark (and brand doesn't want it) jon rules the north but the castle isn't his
answer: In the books, Jon is Robb’s heir. So, he also gained Winterfell, with Sansa. Since he is king in the north.

summary:
Just bend your knees guys
“Jon and Daenerys, I think they could do it together, yeah they would be good.”
“Honestly, what I...
body:
Wolfs wants Dragon inside pack

Just bend your knees guys

Richard Madden

“Jon and Daenerys, I think they could do it together, yeah they would be good.”

Maisie Willams

“I really enjoyed seeing Daenerys and Jon Snow in the same shot,” offered Maisie Williams, who plays Arya Stark. “They just look so great together. You see Emilia and Kit hanging out all the time, but there’s something really bizarre about when they’re all in costume and these worlds start colliding. There’s a little fangirl in me that had a little freak out. That was really cool, and the ongoing joke about Kit’s height is hilarious.”

Sophie Turner

“Honestly, what I think is going to happen – and I don’t know where the story is going to go, but I think Jon (Kit Harington) and Daenerys (Emilia Clarke) are going to end up together, probably.”

“They have a beautiful Targaryen babies “

There’s a little fangirl in me that had a little freak out. That was really cool, and the ongoing joke about Kit’s height is hilarious.”

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: Why Jonsa will never be canon
body:
Why Jonsa will never be canon

First and foremost, this post is not trashing Sansa’s character or Jon’s character, it’s just character analysis.

  • For Jonsa to work, it relies on heavily mischaracterising Jon Snow. A man brought up by the honourable Ned Stark, in a kingdom where incest is frowned upon, is unlikely to hook up with his half-sister/cousin. (Yes people marrying cousins is seen as okay in Westeros but Jon and Sansa were raised as siblings)
  • Jon was raised and taught to choose duty over love, to do the right thing, and as Jon said, “Father would be rolling in his grave” if he didn’t protect Sansa. I’m sure that doesn’t involve him hooking up with her.
  • Jon is incapable of lying. He is too honourable for that. The Political Jon theory doesn’t work because he is not gonna do a complete U-turn on Dany and say “Don’t really bow to you now, just wanted your army and dragons but thanks babes” after doing the whole lying means “words won’t mean anything” speech.
  • Sansa loves Jon but not romantically, do you think she would want to get with her half-brother/cousin that she constantly disagrees with and that doesn’t listen to her advice?
  • It’s pretty clear Jon has fallen for Dany, it’s seen in the recently released S7 scripts, it’s mentioned in the S7 commentaries and presented in season 8 promotional material. Kit Harington said in an interview that Jon and Dany will arrive at Winterfell as “not so secret lovers”.
  • Plus how would Jonsa serve the plot at this stage? There’s an army of dead at their doorstep and they all need to work together so political Jon wouldn’t be plausible at this point. How would Jonsa serve the character’s story arcs? It doesn’t seem the right direction to go in bringing closure to the character’s. As pointed out it would have to involve changing Jon’s character and ignoring his development throughout the series thus making his character inconsistent in the story.

Overall it is illogical for Jonsas go through all this character bashing in order to prove this ship becoming canon.
